content.detailedDescription: The craft hoovered for over an hour but it sent two other objects that flashed and turned sooilid when i was on the phone with 911 operator i filed a police report and i don't never call cops for anything i don't need there help bout this was to incredible to nor file a police report bats up.
content.summary: It hoovered and that's it and other objects c e out .

content.detailedDescription: This is the most crazy thing i have ever seen! i have to believe been visited a couple times by so called grey little people. certainly have been tested with as well as my mom and dad. bigger story!  i have seen which i first thought was a large plastic tarp descending from probably 600 feet towards the field i was walking my dog.  i watched it come to the security  camera on top of post and hover and scan camera!' wtf! it quickly noticed me and my dog and quickly went into sky!! i was scared
content.summary: Hovering craft somewhat clear but changing to background

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a smoke with my girlfriend as i looked to the sky northeast i saw a red bright glowing orb hovering above my house and getting brighter then suddenly it disappeared and then suddenly reappeared, then it flashed and blinked and appeared in a different location near where it originally was hovering. the orb was getting brighter red and started descending in weird directions and then it just started to descend downwards away towards the northwest side of the sky. me and my girlfriend were startled of how weird it was moving and 5 min later after i lost sight of the orb, the skies were flashing white alot as if was lighting but it wasn't cus there were no clouds in sight. the flashing of white in the skies lasted  for about 6 min then it stopped.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw a red bright glowing orb hovering near above my house

content.detailedDescription:
On april 06, 2017 at approximately 1:25 pm i stepped outside my apartment, located in anaheim california, to smokey last cigarette of the day. i was looking nb up at the sky at the stars while smoking. i then turned slightly left to go inside when i noticed a small faintly glowing orb in the sky to the southwest of my location. it was moving east, towards where i was. i the turned, facing south to go inside and that is when i also noticed a huge, very bright white light (about 5 times brighter than the moon) in the sky, directly south of my where my apartment was located. it had very colorful glowing rings around it that were mostly green, bright gold,orange-yellow, pinkish and violet in color. there was also a strange line of smoke or line of a cloud that was horizontal and directly under the object. i thought the line horizontal trail of smoke or clouds was strange because there were no other clouds in the sky. it was a perfectly clear night, with stars visible. 
at first i thought it may be a strange looking moon, but the super colorful rings around it, and the line of smoke underneath it looked so weird that i ran inside to grab nb my cellphone to take a picure. when i came back outside to take the picture i noticed that glowing orb was darting around the large bright object. i took a picture and then decided to turn it to record so i could get a video of the greyish faintly glowing orb that seemed to be bouncing off the large object at very fast speeds across the sky at extremely sharp angles. after a few seconds the small orb vb started moving west again, towards where i first noticed it. si turned off the recording on my phone and went back inside, figuring it was probably nothing that strange after all. when i got back inside, i sat down to quickly look at the picure and video i took. that is when i noticed what was outside was much more than simply a moon. i then went to my calendar to see if it was in fact a full moon that evening, but the moon was not on the calendar to be full until the following week, on april 11, 2017. that left me more confused. so i looked at the video again and i could see the glowing orb  darting around the sky in much more detail than with my naked eye. i attached a copy of the picture to my aunt and sister, and tried to also attach the video to the text, but couldn't figure out how to attach it. i tried until sunrise but i still was unable to send the video to them. i just wanted some type of confirmation that what i was seeing out there was in fact as strange as i thought it was. to this day, i continue to look at the video over and over and still can not make sense of what i saw and filmed that night in the sky. i have pressed play and then paused the video in an effort get a frame by frame look at the images so that i can better identify what was in the sky, but am still unable to make sense of it.
content.summary: I saw a faint glowing orb that traveled east towards a large bright glowing object that had very colorful rings around it. the smaller object darted in, out and around the large object at extreme speeds and angles

content.detailedDescription: we was out looking for ufos.When we noticed what looked like a star. but it kept moving real slow. so i tried to record it.  the ship had scramblers that made my phone go crazy. after about 45 min. i finally manipulated the ships scramblers. then i pushed the record button on my phone. we seen this massive ship with lil ships flying in and around it.  we were at my brothers house in wichita ks. it looked like a huge diamond in the sky. scared the s*** out of me,  kinda like independence day. it was in the sky for already 5 hours, watching earth before we even realized, the star was moving.Thats when i tried to record, but it wouldn't let me. in the sky right in front of us,  the star ''was not'' moving.  but when i tried to record,it was almost impossible. the ship kept trying to fly out my phone but in the sky it was as still as can be. then we noticed lil ufos all around it,  10 or more. i got it all on video. if you watch closely,  one lil ufo shoots of in space like superman from the big ship! there here and watching us.Ive seen slot of videos on youtube but nothing like this
content.summary: Big ship with lil ufos flying in and around it. tge ship had scramblers, was very hard to record

content.detailedDescription: Disc-shape like from north on a path to the south slyly change direction and vanished in an aura-circle-shape like. no sound
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Shocking strange bright lights and disc-shape like craft

content.detailedDescription:
I was on inyo county indian reservation sitting at my computer when i suddenly got an irresistible urge to go drive. while driving my girlfriend and i both looked up into the sky to see 5 huge disc like objects flying right over us.  we got out and watched as the discs changed formations as the passed right over and towards the general direction of los angeles.

 these objects were well over 300ft.
content.summary: I was guided to a spot in california to observe 5 disc like objects execute a gross display of power.

content.detailedDescription: I was on an evening cape cod canal cruise with my wife and noticed a odd colored light slowly moving from my left to right.Because of the color like no aircraft i've ever seen and no blinking white or red or green common aircraft lights,i thought i would take a couple of pctures.I'm glad i did because before i new it the light blinked out. a lady next to me witnessed this also.When i looked at it on my phone and stretched the size, that is when i could see the oval shape.I was exited and glad i got two pictures.
content.summary: Yellow/amber solid light traveling east to west,for  a short time ,dimmed once then blinked out.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I stepped out onto my back deck, and immediately noticed two white lights, orb like, moving in a circular pattern right above the edge of our backyard. they appeared to be chasing one another, would be a distance apart, then would catch each other, disappear for a second then would start again. sometimes they would move in the opposite direction.  my first instinct was to see if there was some type of light coming from a neighbouring backyard but all was dark in the neighbours yards. i watched for about 15 minutes and something about it just seemed weird. i felt uneasy as i watched. when my partner called that night i told him about it and it was still going on above the backyard.  he suggested i take video or a photo so i tried, not thinking it would show up because it was dark, and quickly gave up trying.  the lights danced, under the low cloud cover for about 2 hours.  there was no sound and i wound up trying to convince myself maybe someone had a mobile light for their child and the light was just coming out a window.  it wasn't until the next night when going through photos on my phone watched the few seconds of what i thought was useless video.  i could see the lights dancing on the video and decided to google it.  when i saw photos and videos others had posted it was exactly what i had seen the night of sept 2,2017.  and that's why i'm sharing what i saw...
content.summary: Two round white lights that appeared to chase each other in a circle, would get close then spread apart again moving in a circular pattern right under cloud cover

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard with my girlfriend  having a smoke at around 10:48pm then all of a sudden as i was starring into the sky i saw a red glowing object orb hovering above my house like 100-500 ft away on the nw side of the sky.. as i continued to stare at it , it startled me and i knew it was a ufo right away because i been seeing mysterious things in the sky for years and this one was really jaw dropping cus of how deep bright glowing red it was just hovering then changing directions and acting awkwardly and descending. it also disappeared and reappeared repeatedly and  a sudden awkward blink. it moved suddenly in multiple directions in the same area. as i recorded when it moved away from the camera like 5 min later i saw white flashes in the sky that wasn't lighting then it stopped flashing. later on i also saw a weird fast moving object moving fast in a straight line when i was starring at the moon thru my telescope. could not identify what it was. another sighting before the red orb i saw a triangle shape orbs moving together on the ne side of the sky following a bigger white orb moving fast.. wasn't able to record the triangle orbs cus of bad lighting on the ne side of the sky. tonight was a busy multiple ufo sightings in the sky in cicero il.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I i was starring into the sky and i saw a red glowing orb hovering on the nw side of the sky it was getting brighter then all of a sudden it disappeared and reappeared and blinked once and changed directions and descended

content.detailedDescription: Came across a family photo of a flood in new bedford mass circa 1954. there is a ufo hovering at top right of photo. i can't explain it. i've had this photo for decades and just noticed this.
content.summary: Came across this photo of flood by my fathers home, possible 1954 hurricane aftermath, which i believe to be authentic.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i left my parents house at 9:40pm on 9-3-17, we were backing out of their driveway when i saw these 3 strange lights vertically staggered in the distance.  my parents have lived in that house for the past 21 years, and i grew up there, these were not normal lights.  so i immediately told my husband to look and we quickly drove down the street to investigate the right/yellow blinking, yet stationary lights.

that's when i took the first picture, it was too dark for my iphone to get a good picture, so i circled the 3 dots in red because my phone couldn't focus.  we decided to go home the long way so we could follow the ufos, we made it just down john dodd rd out of my parents neighborhood and we both saw a white colored lighted object fall out of the bottom of the red/yellow blinking object.  we were flabbergasted!

we drove a little further and parked at the intersection of john dodd rd and new cut rd where i took the next picture and video that i attached.

the red/yellow blinking objects were now coming very far apart in a single file path following one another.  they were headed west towards us, then the one coming closest dropped out another white lighted object out of the bottom, then waited a second and dropped another, it then turn right, and started heading n.  as soon as it began heading n, it disappeared from our sight very quickly.

it was followed by 4 other red/yellow blinking ufos.  they all followed the same path, and as soon as they all began to head n they disappeared so fast, but only the first one we saw after we stopped at the intersection dropped out two lit objects.

as they were headed towards us, which was west, so we were looking east, they did not seem to be moving fast at all, and they definitely had the ability to hover in a stationary position as when we first saw them, and then they were stationary momentarily as they dropped things out of the bottom of their ship.

it should also be noted that a jet flew above us during the sighting and was much higher in the air than these objects were.

i wouldn't put it past the government to be testing some random aerospace stuff, but the part that is seriously throwing us for a loop were the following things:
1 - stationary first
2- glowing objects released from the bottom
3 - speed in which they disappeared after turning n, because they were not moving that quickly as they were headed west towards us
4 - they were fairly low to the ground, way below the jet that flew above us.

i would be glad to answer any more questions that you may have.  thanks for listening.  this is my second ufo sighting in my lifetime of 31 years, the other was in the austrian alps when i was 15 with my best friend, but we were young and never reported it.  i definitely believe in life outside of our tiny universe.  i hope this helps in some way, or you all can give us an answer to what it may have been, or if anyone else had reporting seeing something similar to what we saw tonight.

update, i submitted this then it timed out and didn't work, i think it was because of the video, i will not attach it this time, but i can email it to you.  i just want to make sure the report gets submitted.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Group of blinking light ufos that dropped out at least 3 lighted objects from their bottom, then turned n and disappeared quickly.

content.detailedDescription: I was at a bar on the hudson river taking pictures of the sunset. i wanted a perfect pic, as i took the picture i noticed a round bright spot look like a small sun. so i took the picture again and it was there again but in a different place. i could not see it with a naked eye. i took a third pic and it was gone..
content.summary: Was taken pics of sunset i seen something in pic so i took another and seen it in a different spot.. third pic it was gone

content.detailedDescription:
At the time of the sighting i was on my drive.
the objects were so bright and different than anything i had ever seen.
i had no thoughts on what i thought they were at first then after a few seconds i thought the could only have been a ufo.
the objects moved in slowly across the sky in front of me in a single line then hovered until they all formed a triangular shape before disappearing off to the west .I really felt that they couldn't have been anything other than u.F.O's. i lost sight of them when they appeared to go off in to the west and disappear.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw 4 orange orbs in the west sky moving slowly to the north

content.detailedDescription: I helped my wife setup her business at the same location five days a week. from 6pm to about 10pm. on this sunday after setting up the food truck. i sat down and watched the customers arrive and mill around the several other trucks in the lot. at 8:00pm i observed three lights (2 white,1 red,)near the sprint sign to the west. i watched a few minutes. not sure if they were a plane. i went back to watching the customers. after about 5 minutes i looked back towards the lights. the white lights had not moverd. the red one moved around the two white ones. the two white objects were in the same place where i had first observed them. i then then used my cell phone to take a picture and sent it to my daughter. the red one had vanished before i took the picture. i was about to get someone else to look, but the last two vanished. el paso has a large airport. so, i was not sure if i had seen light reflecting off a plane. the moving red object made me doubtful.
content.summary: Observed a single hovering light in the sky at a distance. discovered 2 objects in pic later.

content.detailedDescription: Noticed one blinking light, then the other. lasted for 5-10 min, then disappeared.
content.summary: Noticed one flashing light, then the second. lasted for 5-10 miniutes. when inside to get binaculats, but they whanished.

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i were standing outside about 11pm and watching the sky, because the night before my dad and his gf witnessed a bunch of ufo's around that time in same area. we noticed some bright orb like lights right above the tree lines in se direction. they would get really bright then fade out again and kinda moving like from the left to the right they would disappear for a few moments before returning again. we couldn't tell if the tree line was hiding them or what. then they started to flash color greenish bluish orangish and appeared to be coming closer all of a sudden. and we ran inside house scared. we got some binoculars and went back outside a few moments later and right when i walked outside, after shutting off all exterior lights on home i looked to my right twards our neighbors field in the sw direction, & there was what appeared to be around 6 or so bright white lights which appeared at ground level or pretty close. it wasn't moving, just staying in one place so bright i couldn't see anything else in that direction except light and the lights. i yelled for my sister to get outside now and she came out and i asked her what she thought it was. she thought it was the lights from a billboard sign down on the highway. i looked at it thro the binnos, and it looked just like a disk shape ufo. with 3 lights, i'd guess, on the right and the same on the left side. i took out my phone and joking took a short video and made a alien like voice saying " we come in peace" & she said "et phone home" and then the lights just shut off and it was black and we both ran inside and locked all door freaked out. when we went back outside about 20 minutes after we could now see the billboard sign lights down the hill on the highway and knew that the lights we seen were defintley not from the billboards. living on the property for over 34 years we've become pretty accustomed to the normal lights in the night sky. all of a sudden we hear this like robotic kinda static like muffled sound we couldn't tell where it was coming from. we ran inside again and went to the back yard this time and looking records the east we saw a flashing red and green light right in the tree line it was flashing in about 30 second intervals .
content.summary: Looked outside twards field and was blinded by bright lights appears to be hovering above ground . thought at 1st it was light from billboards  on hwy in distance but then lights are just gone we couldn't see anything but light  until it shut off

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside talking on my cell to my husband when i saw it break from clouds. i took a series of quick pictures to show my husband to see if it looked like a jet. he said he didn't see the aircraft when he zoomed in to the pictures. it seemed to turn and go away from me. before i could get more photos it was gone, was its contails.

i was in shrewsbury for work.  used iphone 6s for images.
i took the pictures.
content.summary: Long type vehicle traveling at high rate of speed. it seemed to change directions. did not look like meteor or airplane.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out on deck in front of my house and saw a giant orange ball of light coming from the north going across sky to the south. i immediately called my husband out when it 1st appeared and he observed it also. approximately 5 minutes later another orange ball or same exact one again flew north to south across the sky.  neither of us could identify the ball of light. i was able to take 2 pictures of 2nd sighting.  waited but did not see it again.
content.summary: Bright orange ball of light flew north to south across sky then another 5 minutes later.

content.detailedDescription: 8/21/17 @ 1:30pm. we were in galveston, tx getting ready to set sail on our carnival cruise ship, the valor. i took the photo during the total eclipse with my cell phone. it looks like another planet. maybe nibiru? i found a similar picture from australia in 2015, but the planet looks father away and less clear. it did not move at all or make a sound. there were 3,000 people on same cruise ship, i wonder how many others took same pic??
content.summary: Looks like a planet 🌎. maybe nibiru???  this happened during the total eclipse on 8/21/17.

content.detailedDescription: Was parked up waiting for my shift to end when looking at the sunset there appeared to be a downward eliptical trail through the clouds and a distant object appeared in the sky leaving what vlooked to be a vapour trail behind it not unlike a standard commercial airliner. the object proceedeed to make a course change port side then disappeared after 4 minutes.
content.summary: Trail through clouds behind setting sun. trail was eliptical

content.detailedDescription:
To his left turni saw an orb follow my plane from akron canton airport since we picked up speed and height it accelerated to match the speed of the plane and was merely a bright flashing ball of light. similarly, on march 14th 2 am in dublin ireland i saw a group of what appeared to be balloons, but then merged then stretched to over 30 feet then changed into an oval. before it elongated it did a 90 degree right angle with no wind on a clear night against a backlit building with a bird doing circles around it, it came to me like an ameba or jellyfish, solid black line but i could see the stars through it, it had thin grey ring of smoke and two small equal size lights moving clockwise stopping for a second while at the same dimming; a second later these tiny rectangles got bright again then moved counterclockwise, and again dimmed and simply repeat, it stayed above me for several minutes, it took off northwest, so i turned around and it came back, this time it was a merkaba meeting up with five more all in a zigzag formation, and simply held position there for about 5 minutes and moved slowly gradually increasing and speed off like lightening. three weeks prior to this i encountered three two couples doing remote viewing on me on a train, no matter what part of the country i was in they just happen to be there, the man was 6.1 tall while the women much shorter. he drew 30 second sketches, then flipped his 8 x 10 pad and asked the women what she thought; they described my face, personality and thoughts. later i blocked them, another set of observers did the same thing and a disabled man made reference to them as working for the media. one week before i was to go back to the us, a group of et's in human form, knew i would be on a train and in what car, they were there before i arrived, even though my ticket purchase was random. since i told no one they knew the future. two of them pretended to me drinking a beer at the exit however they acted like military security. i sat in the last seat and to the right a man stared straight forward, when i asked this man several times what the next station was and he wouldn't respond i then noticed the whole train was suspect. four seats directly in front of me i saw a fat short man in a suit and to his left sat a tall woman. since there was clear glass above for luggage, i could see a great deal from the reflection. i made sure not to be looking up but from my peripheral notice this man pushing large numbered keys on what looked like a large phone the size of a telephone book, he spoke through a wired mic, and when he hit one button only he spoke instantly and since he was answering questions this was not a recording device. he spoke using legal nomenclature very and it tone was aggressive, he bounced ideas off the women, and again this was to find out my thoughts, feelings telepathically not using drawings. i decided to make a call to find out where my dog was taken after it was stolen, as soon as i said described the kind of dog it was and where i was calling my eyes rolled up and i heard the man start pushing buttons, again speaking to groups of people, one button at a time. moments later the women to his left told the guy chopping away thoughtlessly on his meg phone 10 x 12 four inches high, that i was playing him and i was too. i got scared and decided to stand by the two guys at the exit; they asked me where i was headed, and if i was getting off at the next station. i replied i was departing, when the train stopped i got out and they pretended to be waiting for me so at the last second i jumped back on, and returned to my seat. now since i heard they wanted to harm me when i arrived at one place, i pretend not to be eager to jump off fearing id gain another tail. so, when the train came to a full stop, the man next to me that never spoke, waved his arm and hand in a circular motion and said in a condescending slow creepy tone, have a nice day knowing full well only us people say that and he was irish. when, i got off the train, i jumped the tracks and one guy at the ticket office dialed a number and as he was speaking was following me with his head and eye describing me. after running mile, i decided to go back, and when i was on the platform two train agents asked me why i jumped off then on then off again, which is highly unusual for ireland. i simply replied i couldnt determine if my ticket was still valid and they walked away. i knew they were not human and all telepathic, i could tell the people around the train station were controlled by them and this later on was backed up when i was taken aboard a space craft and taken to a few planets. i was instructed, my observations about the earth were correct and i was being helped. i was told to warn people about certain events and i took a photo inside the craft of mars and the moon, both have bases. earth has had laser weapons for a long time and i was told that visitors are shot down because this is a prison planet, and in as much as we think we are being helped that is totally false, humans are a cattle to many groups of ets hence the rockefellers have a vested interest in the spiritual movement, they control all media, all legal systems etc in one giant conspiracy.
in dingle i was told by a women shop owner i had a yellow aura and she and her friends could see it. i subsequently found it was only broadcasting too much. i did find it rather easy to block the remote viewers thoughts and even permanently turn their brains to mush. one of them even grabbed his head as i was doing this claiming i wasnt a nice person. i was tired of them.  in dingle, i noticed a bird flashing on a clear day about 12 noon, i thought nothing of it except of its circular pattern because some birds there do appear to shine in light, but at a distance of 500 feet it simply vanished. later that evening, again this was a month ago, i want to a remote pub had one beer, and a very old man came up to me, normally i am good listener, however, in this instance his face being only two feet from mine i notices his face change, his eyes go from round pupils to slits again and again, he walked away and i wasnt scared just wowed at what i just saw. so, all in one year, two orbs, five transparent ships, ets, abductions  it really set me a-back. because i was really never into ets although i did attend a conference once at university in the 90s. but in 1996 while on a date just about to enter a movie theater, i head clicking and felt like someone or thing blasted me with a mega drug. only when i heard dr. greer talk about fake alien abductions and his symptoms getting hit by a strong energy device last year did i know that it has happen to me for years. i even told doctors, got tests and would always get a clean bill of health. funny enough, only when i refused to join the illuminati and zionist at a secret meeting at dublin castle was i targeted. i also refused to head up and ngo in syria because i knew what they were up too. after that, i was targeted. in retrospect there have been a lot of so-called coincidences, my brother killed in 06, my best friend and prominent business owner assonated in 92, etc. they even stole my dog at this point i want out of this game. i refuse to play anymore. since they can control virtually every detail like the movie the truman show i am tired, i dont want to ever return to earth, nor even be born. in fact, if i had it my way id simply prefer to never have came into existence. every step of the way has been tweaked for them or it or whatever they are. i hear promises again and again but it like democracy, all fakery, all lies. i am self aware now! do you people get it, experiment over, and since i have f*** them all off, this is my end and i will never be recycled here, and if one bails it means curtains for the rest, but i am out of patients, and now the earth will die and everyone in it because i dont care. i came from nothing, i was a blank stupid slow etc, then i realized as a boy i was being intentionally hindered like cattle or sheep, all for an experiment. one doesnt have to look to far for evil. so, best of luck here. these words are my promise to myself at death, i will have never existed nor will i ever have in all timelines all universes; i will never existed and the creator of souls will never know; i am erasing all my experiences and all thought and if they ever try to reconstitute me this universe will never have existed. f*** this planet!  when i leave i can only hope the creator of souls gets a little payback from the dark forces, not with my help but by its own greedy pleasure. i either get my ship and leave or i just watch and do zero.  the eyes of eight, what a bunch of cunts, i hope all universes and all things in all of them erase this universe because i refuse to be in it, it is a lost cause.  cheers!
content.summary: Third reported experience with et's and ufo's

content.detailedDescription: Got to work early, stepped out of vehicle to smoke a cigarette, scopes the parking lot as i do every morning when i noticed the formation above a close billboard watched the crafts fly in a circular formation till they scattered, they flew around the south east sky for a few moments and reformed the circular path, after a few minutes they broke off, two of the crafts almost collided and arched in opposite directions before reforming the circle, this lasted about 14 minutes, then the 9 crafts formed a v shape and shot straight up...
content.summary: Objects flight path began in circular formation, scattered reformed, scattered, then shot up in v form

content.detailedDescription:
During our stay in mexico city my girlfriend and i visited the templo mayor site and museum. we did not see anything strange that day in the skies of mexico city. when we returned home from our vacation i downloaded from my girlfriend's i-phone pictures she had taken at mentioned site. while reviewing the pictures i noticed strange glowing and non-glowing objects in attached photo img 3223.Jpg. this photo was taken by her from inside the templo mayor museum. she does not recall seeing any of these object when she took the picture. the photo captures glowing saucer shaped and orb like objects and a non-glowing saucer shaped object hovering above mexico city. if the picture is magnified you can see the non-glowing dark/greyish saucer shaped object hovering in between the clouds(see top photo, in the middle).
when i first saw this picture my girlfriend took i thought maybe these are reflections of lights from within the museum. at the other hand the pattern of these objects does not correspond with the pattern of the lights from within the museum. also the glowing object between the domes of the cathedral seems to be to far away to be a reflection of a light from within the museum. the non-glowing saucer shaped object does not seem to be neither a reflection nor dirt. 
in light of the above i would like to submit aforementioned photo for analysis by mufon in order to find out if we are dealing here with something mondain or out of this world.
hoping for a quick response.
best regards.
content.summary: Picture taken from inside templo mayor museum of bright lights above mexico city

content.detailedDescription: Myself and 2 adult witnesses were outside watching a minor fireworks display. the fireworks were 1km away facing south. my friend said check out this green light. we turned anticlockwise away from the fireworks and looked up to see a bright flashing green light. my friend, the first witness who had been watching the light 10 seconds  before alerting us, had watched the light travel then stop and hover. when i and the other witness looked up, the bright green light was flashing and stationary. all 3 of us watched this bright light completely for 50seconds. the speed of the flashing green light slowed then changed two a red then white flashing light. the red and white light was a very fast strobe which was very brief. at the same time as the light colour change the light changed direction coming towards us. the light moved towards us about 50meters. the light then paused in motion with the light changing back to the bright green flashing light. the flashing light then started moving in the direction it came from. the speed of the light left at high velocity. the 3rd witness and i walked 2 meters from where we stood so we could track the green light in motion. we watched it move towards hills at an insanely fast past until we could no longer see it (disappeared over the horizon)the first witness says he has never seen anything like it. the 3rd witness described the light as almost 'jumping' because while the flashes remained consistent the distance between the flashes was significantly larger. all 3 of us noted that there was no sound coming from that direction at all and that a conventional airplane could not make that tight turn (when it came towards us) before leaving.
content.summary: Green pulsatiing light in motion from n/e hovered, light changed colour and flash sped  twice then flew off at high speed in e direction
